title: The Wake-Up Call
description: You either love him or hate him. No matter if you think heâ€™s an asshole or just a nice guy in a heap of trouble, Jack Reynolds will stir your feelings...On the surface he has it the women, the career, and the Central Park view penthouse, but behind his well-groomed and chiseled facade he has nothing. Find out how Jack gets his life-changing wake-up call in this fast-paced, heartfelt and funny novel about soul-searching, friendship, and love.Readers response to The Wake-Up Call..."A contemporary Don Draper!""A riveting page-turner.""Brilliant fun for small money.""If you don't smile to this book, you probably never smile anyway.""Like a male Bridget Jones in the voice of Marian Keyes.""Good style, great flow! author: Jonas Eriksson
